Jacob Parry

I’m Jacob

I’m a Canadian developer with a special interest in web-based applications and server administration. Currently enrolled in the Computer Programmer Analyst program at Fanshawe College in London, ON, Canada, I will be graduating in December 2016. This is a co-operative education program, which means that I get valuable work experience while still enrolled in school.

I have experience working with

  • Python
  • PHP
  • Java
  • C++
  • C#/.NET
  • JavaScript
  • HTML5/CSS3
  • SQL
  • Go
  • Docker and LXC containers
  • Markdown, reStructuredText, YAML, and more

Work Experience

I’m currently employed at Digital Echidna as a Web Developer for my May 2016 — August 2016 co-op work term, which will be my third and final co-op work term. I spend my days creating awesome websites with awesome people using Drupal, one of the world’s leading Content Management Systems.
